Verses: 1 muppadhaam Varusham Naalaam Maasam Aindhaanthedhiyile, Naan Kebaar Nadhiyandaiyile Siraippattavargal Naduvil Irukkumpodhu, Sambaviththadhu Ennavendraal, Vaanangal Thirakkappada, Naan Dhevadharisanangalaik Kanden.
2 adhu Yoyaakkeen Raajaavudaiya Siraiyiruppin Aindhaam Varushamaayirundhadhu.

3 andha Aindhaanthedhiyile, Kaldheyar Dhesaththilulla Kebaar Nadhiyandaiyile Poosiyennum Aasaariyanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Esekkiyelukkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaagi, Ange Karththarudaiya Karam Avanmel Amarndhadhu.

4 idho, Vadakkeyirundhu Pusalkaatrum Periya Megamum, Aththode Kalandha Akkiniyum Varakkanden; Adhai Sutrilum Pragaasamum, Adhin Naduvil Akkinikkullirundhu Vilangiya Sogusaavin Niramum Undaayirundhadhu.
5 adhin Naduvilirundhu Naalu Jeevangal Thondrina; Avaigalin Saayal Manusha Saayalaayirundhadhu.
6 avaigalil Ovvondrukkum Nannaangu Mugangalum, Ovvondrukkum Nannaangu Settaigalum Irundhana.

7 avaigaludaiya Kaalgal Nimirndha Kaalgalaayirundhana; Avaigaludaiya Ullankaalgal Kandrukkuttiyin Ullankaalgalukku Oppaayirundhana; Avaigal Thulakkappatta Vengalaththin Varunamaai Minnikkondirundhana.
8 avaigaludaiya Settaigalin Keezh Avaigalin Naalu Pakkangalilum Manusha Kaigal Irundhana; Andha Naalukkum Adhinadhin Mugangalum Adhinadhin Settaigalum Undaayirundhana.
9 avaigal Ovvondrin Settaigalum Matradhin Settaigalode Serndhirundhana; Avaigal Sellugaiyil Thirumbaamal Ovvondrum Thanthan Thisaikku Nermugamaai Sendrana.
10 avaigaludaiya Mugangalin Saayalaavadhu; Valadhupakkaththil Naalum Manushamugamum Singamugamum, Idadhupakkaththil Naalum Erudhu Mugamum Kazhugu Mugamumaayirundhana.

11 avaigaludaiya Mugangal Ippadiyirukka, Avaigaludaiya Settaigal Mele Pirindhirundhana, Ovvondrukkumulla Irandirandu Settaigal Ondrodondru Serndhirundhana; Matra Irandirandu Settaigal Avaigaludaiya Udalgalai Moodina.
12 avaigal Ovvondrum Thanthan Thisaikku Nermugamaai Sendradhu; Aavi Pogavendumendrirundha Evvidaththukkum Avaigal Poyina; Pogaiyil Avaigal Thirumbippaarkkavillai.

13 jeevangaludaiya Saayal Eppadiyirundhadhendraal, Avaigal Erigira Akkiniththazhalin Thotramum Theevarththigalin Thotramumaayirundhadhu; Andha Akkini Jeevangalukkulle Ulaavip Pragaasamaayirundhadhu; Akkiniyilirundhu Minnal Purappattadhu.
14 andha Jeevangal Minnalin Thotrampola Odiththirindhana.
15 naan Andha Jeevangalaip Paarththuk Kondirukkaiyil, Idho, Boomiyil Jeevangalandaiyile Naalu Mugangalaiyudaiya Oru Sakkaraththaik Kanden.

16 sakkarangalin Roobamum Avaigalin Velaiyum Padigappachchai Varunamaayirundhadhu; Avaigal Naalukkum Orevidha Saayal Irundhadhu; Avaigalin Roobamum Avaigalin Velaiyum Sakkaraththukkul Sakkaram Irukkumaappol Irundhadhu.
17 avaigal Odugaiyil Thangal Naalu Pakkangalilum Odum, Odugaiyil Avaigal Thirumbugiradhillai.
18 avaigalin Vattangal Bayangarappadaththakka Uyaramaayirundhana; Andha Naalu Vattangalum Sutrilum Kangalaal Niraindhirundhana.
19 andha Jeevangal Sellumpodhu, Andha Sakkarangal Avaigal Aruge Odina; Andha Jeevangal Boomiyilirundhu Ezhumbumpodhu Sakkarangalum Ezhumbina.

20 aavi Pogavendumendrirundha Evvidaththukkum Avaigal Poyina; Avvidaththukku Avaigalin Aaviyum Pogavendumendrirundhadhu; Sakkarangalum Avaigalin Aruge Ezhumbina; Jeevanudaiya Aavi Sakkarangalil Irundhadhu.

21 avaigal Sellumpodhu Ivaigalum Sendrana; Avaigal Nirkum Podhu Ivaigalum Nindrana; Avaigal Boomiyilirundhu Ezhumbumpodhu, Sakkarangalum Avaigal Aruge Ezhumbina; Jeevanudaiya Aavi Sakkarangalil Irundhadhu.
22 jeevanudaiya Thalaigalinmel Bramikkaththakka Vachchirappragaasamaana Oru Mandalam Irundhadhu; Adhu Avaigaludaiya Thalaigalinmel Uyara Virindhirundhadhu.

23 mandalaththinkeezh Avaigaludaiya Settaigal Ondrukkondru Edhir Neraai Virindhirundhana; Thangalthangal Udalgalai Moodikkollugira Irandirandu Settaigal Irupakkaththilum Irukkira Ovvondrukkum Irundhana.

24 avaigal Sellumpodhu Avaigaludaiya Iraichchalaik Ketten; Adhu Peruvellaththin Iraichchalpolavum, Oru Raanuvaththin Iraichchalukku Oththa Aaravaaraththin Saththampolavumirundhadhu; Avaigal Nirkumpodhu Thangal Settaigalaith Thalaravittirundhana.
25 avaigal Nindru Thangal Settaigalaith Thalaravittirukkaiyil, Avaigaludaiya Thalaigalukku Melaana Mandalaththinmelirundhu Oru Saththam Pirandhadhu.
26 avaigalin Thalaigalukkumelulla Mandalaththinmeedhil Neelaraththinampola Vilangum Oru Singaasanaththin Saayalum, Andha Singaasanaththin Saayalinmel Manushasaayalukku Oththa Oru Saayalum Irundhadhu.

27 avarudaiya Iduppaagak Kaanappattadhumudhal Melellaam Utpuram Sutrilum Akkinimayamaana Sogusaavin Niramaayirukkakkanden; Avarudaiya Iduppaagak Kaanappattadhumudhal Keezhellaam Akkinimayamaagavum, Adhai Sutrilum Pragaasamaagavum Irukkakkanden.

28 mazhaipeyyum Naalil Megaththil Vaanavil Eppadik Kaanappadugiradho, Appadiye Sutrilumulla Andhap Pragaasam Kaanappattadhu; Idhuve Karththarudaiya Magimaiyin Saayalukkuriya Dharisanamaayirundhadhu; Adhai Naan Kandapodhu Mugankuppura Vizhundhen; Appozhudhu Pesugira Oruvarudaiya Saththaththaik Ketten.
